text: Anssumane "Ansu" Fati Vieira (born 31 October 2002) is a Spanish professional footballer. He plays as a left winger for Barcelona and the Spain national team. He was born in Guinea-Bissau but represents Spain internationally. ==Statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National Cup EFL Cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Barcelona 2019–20 La Liga 24 7 3 0 – 5 1 1 0 33 8 2020–21 La Liga 7 4 0 0 – 3 1 0 0 10 5 2021–22 La Liga 10 4 1 0 – 3 1 1 1 15 6 2022–23 La Liga 36 7 5 2 – 8 0 2 1 51 10 2023–24 La Liga 3 0 0 0 – 0 0 0 0 3 0 Total Total 80 22 9 2 – 19 3 4 2 112 29 Brighton & Hove Albion (loan) 2023–24 Premier League 6 2 0 0 1 0 3 1 – 10 3 Career total 86 24 9 2 1 0 22 4 4 2 122 32 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Spain 2020 4 1 2022 3 1 2023 3 0 Total Total 10 2 Scores and results list Spain's goal tally first.
